verses.verse: In the third <WH7992> month <WH2320> after the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were gone forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, the same day <WH3117> came <WH935> they into the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>.

And when they were departed <WH5265> from Rephidim <WH7508>, and were come <WH935> to the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>, they encamped <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057>; and there Israel <WH3478> encamped <WH2583> before the mount <WH2022>.

And Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> unto God <WH430>, and Jehovah <WH3068> called <WH7121> unto him out of the mountain <WH2022>, saying <WH559>, Thus shalt thou say <WH559> to the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and tell <WH559> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>:
Ye have seen <WH7200> what I did <WH6213> unto the Egyptians <WH4714>, and how I bare <WH5375> you on eagles <WH5404>' wings <WH3671>, and brought you unto myself <WH935>.

Now therefore <WH8085>, if ye will obey my voice <WH6963> indeed <WH8085>, and keep <WH8104> my covenant <WH1285>, then ye shall be mine own possession <WH5459> from among all peoples <WH5971>: for all the earth is mine <WH776>:

and ye shall be unto me a kingdom <WH4467> of priests <WH3548>, and a holy <WH6918> nation <WH1471>. These are the words <WH1697> which thou shalt speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And Moses <WH4872> came <WH935> and called <WH7121> for the elders <WH2205> of the people <WH5971>, and set before them all these words <WH1697> which Jehovah <WH3068> commanded him <WH6680>.

And all the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> together <WH3162>, and said <WH559>, All that Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> we will do <WH6213>. And Moses <WH4872> reported <WH7725> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Lo <WH935>, I come unto thee in a thick <WH5645> cloud <WH6051>, that the people <WH5971> may hear <WH8085> when I speak <WH1696> with thee <WH539>, and may also believe thee for ever <WH5769>. And Moses <WH4872> told <WH5046> the words <WH1697> of the people <WH5971> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Go <WH3212> unto the people <WH5971>, and sanctify <WH6942> them to-day <WH3117> and to-morrow <WH4279>, and let them wash <WH3526> their garments <WH8071>,

and be ready <WH3559> against the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>; for the third <WH7992> day <WH3117> Jehovah <WH3068> will come down <WH3381> in the sight <WH5869> of all the people <WH5971> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>.

And thou shalt set bounds <WH1379> unto the people <WH5971> round about <WH5439>, saying <WH559>, Take heed <WH8104> to yourselves <WH5927>, that ye go not up into the mount <WH2022>, or touch <WH5060> the border <WH7097> of it <WH5060>: whosoever toucheth the mount <WH2022> shall be surely <WH4191> put to death <WH4191>:

no hand <WH3027> shall touch <WH5060> him <WH5619>, but he shall surely be stoned <WH5619>, or <WH176> shot <WH3384> through <WH3384>; whether it be beast <WH929> or <WH176> man <WH376>, he shall not live <WH2421>: when the trumpet <WH3104> soundeth long <WH4900>, they shall come up <WH5927> to the mount <WH2022>.
And Moses <WH4872> went down <WH3381> from the mount <WH2022> unto the people <WH5971>, and sanctified <WH6942> the people <WH5971>; and they washed <WH3526> their garments <WH8071>.
And he said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Be <WH1961> ready <WH3559> against the third <WH7969> day <WH3117>: come <WH5066> not near a woman <WH802>.

And it came to pass on the third <WH7992> day <WH3117>, when it was morning <WH1242>, that there were thunders <WH6963> and lightnings <WH1300>, and a thick <WH3515> cloud <WH6051> upon the mount <WH2022>, and the voice <WH6963> of a trumpet <WH7782> exceeding <WH3966> loud <WH2389>; and all the people <WH5971> that were in the camp <WH4264> trembled <WH2729>.
And Moses <WH4872> brought forth <WH3318> the people <WH5971> out of the camp <WH4264> to meet <WH7125> God <WH430>; and they stood <WH3320> at the nether <WH8482> part of the mount <WH2022>.

And mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, the whole of it <WH6225>, smoked, because <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> descended <WH3381> upon it in fire <WH784>; and the smoke <WH6227> thereof ascended <WH5927> as the smoke <WH6227> of a furnace <WH3536>, and the whole mount <WH2022> quaked <WH2729> greatly <WH3966>.

And when the voice <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782> waxed <WH6963> louder <WH1980> and <WH2390> louder <WH2390>, Moses <WH4872> spake <WH1696>, and God <WH430> answered <WH6030> him by a voice <WH6963>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> came down <WH3381> upon mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>, to the top <WH7218> of the mount <WH2022>: and Jehovah <WH3068> called <WH7121> Moses <WH4872> to <WH413> the top <WH413> of the mount <WH2022>; and Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, Go down <WH3381>, charge <WH5749> the people <WH5971>, lest they break through <WH2040> unto Jehovah <WH3068> to gaze <WH7200>, and many <WH7227> of them perish <WH5307>.
And let the priests <WH3548> also <WH5066>, that come near to Jehovah <WH3068>, sanctify <WH6942> themselves <WH3068>, lest Jehovah break forth upon them <WH6555>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, The people <WH5971> cannot <WH3201> come up <WH5927> to mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514>: for thou didst charge <WH5749> us <WH559>, saying, Set bounds <WH1379> about the mount <WH2022>, and sanctify it <WH6942>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, Go, get thee down <WH3381>; and thou shalt come up <WH5927>, thou <WH175>, and Aaron with thee <WH3548>: but let not the priests and the people <WH5971> break through <WH2040> to come up <WH5927> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, lest he break forth upon them <WH6555>.
So Moses <WH4872> went down <WH3381> unto the people <WH5971>, and told them <WH559>.
